class_notes: This is an online synchronous course. Prerequisite: EPI 530 or EPI 504.
course_description: Pre-requisites: EPI 504 or EPI 530.  This course will focus on the contribution of social factors to health and disease in human populations. With an emphasis on both theory and methods, seven topics of contemporary interest to public health research will be covered in depth: (1) social status; (2) race, ethnicity and racism; (3) geography/place; (4) immigration; (5) health literacy; (6) stress; and (7) social support.
